content.rendered:
01

Cultural context is essential to drive impact for your idea. Be aware of the conversations that are dominating in news, on social, and on message boards
to give your idea the relevance it needs to get attention.

02

Data and technology can enable outstanding work, and businesses should embrace this potential.

03

Technology and storytelling are not mutually exclusive — technology shouldn’t be in front of the idea but should help inform the narrative.

04

Personalisation at scale is still the ultimate marketing dream.

05

Be the first to win. First to execute an idea, first to uncover an insight, first to use a technology, first to identify an issue, first to create a new product.

06

Understand the rules of your category and break them.
Rule-breakers get noticed.

 

Read the next article:

Re-innovating the wheel

by Shane Casey, Head of Digital

Or see all our articles from Cannes Lions 2018

excerpt.rendered: Our top tips and learnings from a week of creative inspiration at Cannes Lions.
